document.full_text: india's central bank raised interest rates by a bigger-than-expected 50 basis points on tuesday and declared it would battle stubbornly high inflation even at the cost of some economic slowdown, casting doubt over the government's ambitious growth targets.
document.title: india central bank toughens stance, lifts rates by 50 bps
lines_and_colors: india's central bank raised interest rates by a bigger-than-expected 50 basis points on tuesday and declared it would battle stubbornly high inflation even at the cost of some economic slowdown, casting doubt over the government's ambitious growth targets.
